name: azuracast
description: AzuraCast is a self-hosted web radio management platform with built-in auto-DJ, listener statistics, web media library, REST and WebSocket APIs, and public station pages. Designed to manage internet radio stations with minimal setup.
features: Web Radio Platform: Complete internet radio station management. Professional broadcasting.
Auto-DJ: Automated playlist management and scheduling. 24/7 broadcasting.
Listener Statistics: Track audience and listening patterns. Understand your audience.
Media Library: Organize and manage your music collection. Complete catalog.
Public Pages: Customizable station pages for listeners. Professional presence.
REST API: Programmatic control and integration. Developer-friendly.
WebSocket Support: Real-time updates and interactions. Live features.
Self-Hosted: Run your own radio station infrastructure. Complete control.
